00024 template<class T>
00025 inline bool operator < (T const& x, T const& y) { 
00026     return memcmp(&x, &y, sizeof(T)) < 0;
00027 }
00028     
00029 template<class T>
00030 inline bool operator > (T const& x, T const& y) { 
00031     return memcmp(&x, &y, sizeof(T)) > 0;
00032 }

00037 class FASTDB_DLL_ENTRY dbAnyArray { 
00038     friend class dbTableDescriptor;
00039   protected:
00040     size_t len;
00041 
00042   public:
00043     static void arrayAllocator(dbAnyArray* aArray, void* data, size_t length)
00044     {
00045         aArray->len = length;
00046         *(void**)(aArray+1) = data;
00047     }
00052     size_t length() const { return len; }
00053 
00058     void const* base() const { return *(void*const*)(this+1); }
00059 };

00065 template<class T>
00066 class dbArray : public dbAnyArray { 
00067     friend class dbTableDescriptor;
00068   protected:
00069     T*     data;
00070     size_t allocated;
00071     
00072     static void arrayAllocator(dbAnyArray* aArray, void* data, size_t length)
00073     {
00074         dbArray* array = (dbArray*)aArray;
00075         array->len = length;
00076         if (array->allocated) { 
00077             delete[] array->data;
00078         }
00079         if (data != NULL || length == 0) { 
00080             array->data = (T*)data;
00081             array->allocated = 0;
00082         } else { 
00083             array->data = new T[length];
00084             array->allocated = length;
00085         }
00086     }
00087  
00088     inline void memcpy(T* dst, T const* src, size_t len) { 
00089         int n = (int)len;
00090         while (--n >= 0) { 
00091             *dst++ = *src++;
00092         }
00093     }
00094 
00095     inline void memmove(T* dst, T const* src, size_t len) { 
00096         int n = (int)len;
00097         if (dst < src) {
00098             while (--n >= 0) { 
00099                 *dst++ = *src++;
00100             }
00101         } else { 
00102             dst += n;
00103             src += n;       
00104             while (--n >= 0) { 
00105                 *--dst = *--src;
00106             }
00107         }
00108     }
00109  
00110   public:
00111     static int arrayComparator(void const* a, void const* b, size_t) { 
00112         return ((dbArray*)a)->compare(*(dbArray*)b);
00113     }
00114 
00115     dbFieldDescriptor* dbDescribeComponents(dbFieldDescriptor* fd) { 
00116         fd->type = fd->appType = dbField::tpArray;
00117         fd->dbsSize = sizeof(dbVarying);
00118         fd->alignment = 4;
00119         fd->arrayAllocator = arrayAllocator;
00120         fd->_comparator = arrayComparator;
00121         return dbDescribeField(new dbFieldDescriptor("[]", 0, sizeof(T), 0), *(T*)fd); 
00122     }
00123 
00127     dbArray() { 
00128         data = NULL; 
00129         len = 0;
00130         allocated = 0;
00131     }
00132 
00137     dbArray(size_t size) { 
00138         data = (size != 0) ? new T[size] : NULL;
00139         len = size;
00140         allocated = size;
00141     }
00142 
00150     dbArray(T const* ptr, size_t size, size_t allocate = 0) { 
00151         len = size;
00152         allocated = allocate;
00153         if (allocate != 0) { 
00154             assert(allocate >= size);
00155             data = new T[allocate];
00156             memcpy(data, ptr, size);    
00157         } else { 
00158             data = (T*)ptr;
00159         }
00160     }
00161 
00166     dbArray(dbArray const& arr) { 
00167         allocated = arr.allocated;
00168         len = arr.len;
00169         if (allocated) { 
00170             data = new T[allocated];
00171             memcpy(data, arr.data, len);        
00172         } else { 
00173             data = arr.data;
00174         }
00175     }
00176 
00180     ~dbArray() { 
00181         if (allocated) { 
00182             delete[] data;
00183         }
00184     }
00185 
00190     dbArray& operator = (dbArray const& arr) { 
00191         if (this == &arr) { 
00192             return *this;
00193         }
00194         if (allocated) { 
00195             delete[] data;
00196         }
00197         if ((len = arr.len) != 0) { 
00198             data = new T[len];
00199             memcpy(data, arr.data, len);
00200         }
00201         allocated = len;
00202         return *this;
00203     }
00204 
00209     T const& last() {
00210         assert(len > 0);
00211         return data[len-1];
00212     }
00213 
00221     void assign(T const* ptr, size_t size, bool copy = true) { 
00222         if (allocated) { 
00223             delete[] data;
00224         }
00225         len = size;
00226         if (copy && size != 0) { 
00227             data = new T[size];
00228             memcpy(data, ptr, size);    
00229             allocated = size;
00230         } else { 
00231             data = (T*)ptr;
00232             allocated = 0;
00233         }
00234     }
00235 
00241     T const& operator [](size_t index) const { 
00242         assert(index < len);
00243         return data[index];
00244     }
00245 
00251     void putat(size_t index, T const& value) { 
00252         assert(index < len);
00253         if (!allocated) { 
00254             T* copy = new T[len];
00255             memcpy(copy, data, len);
00256             data = copy;
00257             allocated = len;
00258         }
00259         data[index] = value;
00260     }
00261 
00262     
00268     T const& getat(size_t index) const {
00269         assert(index < len);
00270         return data[index];
00271     }
00272 
00276     void clear() { 
00277         if (allocated) {
00278             delete[] data;
00279         }
00280         data = NULL;
00281         len = 0;
00282         allocated = 0;
00283     }
00284 
00285     int compare(dbArray const& other) const { 
00286         size_t n = len < other.len ? len : other.len;
00287         T* p = data;
00288         T* q = other.data;
00289         for (size_t i = 0; i < n; i++) { 
00290             if (p[i] < q[i]) {
00291                 return -1;
00292             } else if (p[i] > q[i]) { 
00293                 return 1;
00294             }
00295         }
00296         return (int)(len - other.len);
00297     }
00298 
00299 
00304     void resize(size_t size) { 
00305         if (size > len && size > allocated) { 
00306             T* p = new T[size];
00307             memcpy(p, data, len);
00308             if (allocated) { 
00309                 delete[] data;
00310             }
00311             data = p;
00312             allocated = size;
00313         }
00314         len = size;
00315     }
00316 
00321     void append(T const& value) { 
00322         insert(value, len);
00323     }
00324     
00332     int bsearch(T value) {
00333         size_t l = 0, r = len;
00334         while (l < r) { 
00335             size_t m = (l + r) >> 1;
00336             if (data[m] < value) { 
00337                 l = m + 1;
00338             } else { 
00339                 r = m;
00340             }
00341         }
00342         return r;
00343     }
00344 
00349     bool appendUnique(T const& value) { 
00350         if (contains(value)) {
00351             return false;
00352         }
00353         insert(value, len);
00354         return true;
00355     }
00356 
00361     bool contains(T const& value) { 
00362         for (int i = 0, n = len; i < n; i++) {
00363             if (data[i] == value) {
00364                 return true;
00365             }
00366         }
00367         return false;
00368     }
00369 
00375     void insert(T const& value, size_t index = 0) { 
00376         assert(index <= len);
00377         if (len >= allocated) {
00378             size_t newSize = len == 0 ? 8 : len*2;
00379             T* p = new T[newSize];
00380             memcpy(p, data, index);
00381             p[index] = value;
00382             memcpy(p+index+1, data+index, (len-index));
00383             if (allocated) { 
00384                 delete[] data;
00385             }
00386             data = p;
00387             allocated = newSize;
00388         } else { 
00389             memmove(data+index+1, data+index, (len-index));
00390             data[index] = value;
00391         }
00392         len += 1;
00393     }
00394     
00399     void remove(size_t index) { 
00400         assert(index < len);
00401         len -= 1;
00402         if (index != len && !allocated) { 
00403             T* p = new T[len];
00404             memcpy(p, data, index);
00405             memcpy(p+index, data+index+1, (len-index));
00406             allocated = len;
00407             data = p;
00408         } else { 
00409             memmove(data+index, data+index+1, (len-index));
00410         }
00411     }
00412 
00417     T const* get() const { return data; }
00418 
00423     T* update() { 
00424         if (!allocated) {
00425             T* copy = new T[len];
00426             memcpy(copy, data, len);
00427             data = copy;
00428             allocated = len;
00429         }
00430         return data; 
00431     }
00432 };

00439 template<class T>
00440 int index(dbArray<T> const& a, T value) {
00441     for (int i = 0, n = a.length(); i < n; i++) {
00442       if (a[i] == value) {
00443           return i;
00444       }
00445     }
00446     return -1;
00447 }
00448 
00454 template<class T>
00455 int rindex(dbArray<T> const& a, T value) {
00456     int i = (int)a.length();
00457     while (--i >= 0 && a[i] != value);
00458     return i;
00459 }
